text: Federico Serrano (born 28 September 1944) is a Mexican equestrian. He competed in the individual dressage event at the 1968 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1944 births Category:Living people Category:Mexican male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Mexico Category:Equestrians at the 1968 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Mexico City
title: Federico Serrano
